entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Inukjuak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 43 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
